## JSONRPCRequest type

JSON RPC Request object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type JSONRPCRequest = {
    jsonrpc: '2.0';
    id?: string | number | null;
    method: string;
    params: readonly unknown[] | object;
};
```
